tasks.name: Validation for forms
tasks.description:
Ask Seph about validation, because Vue escapes all potentially harmful characters. What is the need to actually check these ourselves? And what else do I need to validate? 

Example: <script>alert("Boo!")</script>

tasks.name: Endpoint for Schedule
tasks.description: Create a way to only see all the tasks and not only the home page

tasks.name: Endpoint for Add Task
tasks.description: Create a way to add Tasks

tasks.name: See separate tasks
tasks.description: Create a way to see a task with a specific id

tasks.name: Create Component for Task
tasks.description: Create a component to be reused for every Task, that will be used by the Tasks component

tasks.name: A way to remove/mark task as completed
tasks.description: Create a function to remove tasks/mark them as completed, maybe create a way to only view completed tasks

tasks.name: Create Component for Footer
tasks.description: Create a component for a footer, like NavBar

tasks.name: Pushing after adding
tasks.description: Add correct code to push user to new added task when task is added.

tasks.name: Add name to Home
tasks.description: Add user input for name so that it does not say unknown and instead says the users inputted name.

tasks.name: Anpassning mobil&desktop
tasks.description: Anpassa sidan för mobil och desktop/platta, genom en mediaquery för mobil och desktop/platta.

tasks.name: Beskrivning av funktionalitet
tasks.description: Gör en beskrivning av egen funktionalitet jag har lagt till med skärmdumpar och kort förklaring av vad koden gör. Jag ska också ge minst ett exempel på något i mitt program som jag hade velat utveckla som en förbättring av programmet. Lämnas in skriftligt som t.ex word-fil tillsammans med källkod till hemsidan.
